definitions.definition: A product consisting of a liquid which has had other ingredients steeped in it to extract useful qualities.
definitions.example: An extract of rooibos and chamomile makes a refreshing infusion.

definitions.definition: The act of steeping or soaking a substance in liquid so as to extract medicinal or herbal qualities.
The act of installing a quality into a person.
The act of dipping into a fluid.
(medicine) The administration of liquid substances directly into a vein for medical purposes; perfusion.
